body: So my discussion was blocked......lol btw RCMP_Mountie it wasnt anything personal...it was meant to make some people laugh......im sorry for the misunderstanding.......:)

title: To make things clear

replies.body:
I understand your sense of humor, but please refrain from making topics that contribute little to the forum discussion, such as spam or topics that revolve around a single person.

Locking to prevent further spam.
